snippet: Michael Jackson was an exception to so many rules that few of the case’s issues apply to other performers, executives said.
abstract: Music industry experts say that legal battles over Michael Jackson's death are unlikely to set precedents that could apply to other performers, given unique and outsized nature of Jackson's lifestyle and contracts; concert promoter AEG Live was found not liable in Jackson's death.
lead_paragraph: Michael Jackson was an exception to so many rules that few of the case’s issues apply to other performers, executives said.

headline.main: Influence of Jackson Verdict Is Limited
headline.print_headline: Influence Of Jackson Verdict Is Limited
